mapper.sql: id, data_element_id, data_element_attribute_id, data_element_attribute_value, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into data_element_attribute (id, data_element_id, data_element_attribute_id, data_element_attribute_value, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementAttributeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementAttributeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
delete from data_element_attribute where id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT dea.data_element_attribute_id as attributeId, dea.data_element_attribute_value as dataElementAttributeValue, ad.attribute_name as attributeName FROM `data_element_attribute` dea LEFT JOIN attribute_definition ad ON dea.data_element_attribute_id = ad.attribute_id WHERE data_element_id = #{dataElementId}
